attributes.action: Stop flights to and from infected Coronavirus countries and properly isolate
attributes.additional_details: The government are putting the public at risk, we have already been warned if we do not take action this week (9/3/2020) in three weeks we’ll be in Italy’s situation. Time to take action or face the consequences that the government will be responsible for thousands of deaths that could of been avoided. The public find this very concerning.
attributes.background: The government are not isolating people coming from Coronavirus infected countries and are expecting them to self isolate which they aren’t doing. They are putting the public at risk, this must be stopped immediately. We need to be proactive.
